feats.adventurer:
If you have one or more Warp talents, whenever you make a d6 roll for one, also roll for a new high weirdness effect. The new effect replaces the weirdness effect currently active, if any.
	If you have no Warp talents, roll for a new high weirdness effect whenever you draw an iconic spell.
feats.champion: Once per battle when you roll for a high weirdness effect, roll twice and use both results. Reroll duplicate results.
feats.epic: One battle per day, each time you roll for a high weirdness effect, roll twice and use both results. Reroll duplicate results. Good luck!
